# Quarterly Results

Below is a table with the latest quarterly metrics.

| Quarter | Revenue | Growth |
|---------|---------|--------|
| Q1      | $1.2M   | 12%    |
| Q2      | $1.4M   | 16%    |
| Q3      | $1.6M   | 18%    |
| Q4      | $1.9M   | 22%    |

**Highlights**: *Strong* growth in the second half of the year.
